bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with sun xie 飧泄 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhu 术 quoting SWBJQYBMJ Mj: 不飲水而穀完出，名曰飧泄…泄止後服椒术丸 , “[Patients] have not drunk water and yet their food [lit. grain] is released undigested. This is called ‘outflow of [undigested] food’...Once the outflow has been stopped, [patients] ingest the pills with [ shu ] jiao and [ cang ] zhu ”, writes: 飧瀉久痢：椒术 丸 , “For outflow of [ undigested ] food and long-lasting free-flux illness, [ingest] the pills with [ shu ] jiao and [ cang ] zhu ”,
